WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 04 March 2025
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas extending from  Galle
to Pottuvil via Hambantota .
Winds:
Winds  will  be  north-easterly  to  easterly  and  speed  will  be  (25-35)  kmph.    Wind  speed  will
increase  up  to  (40-45)  kmph  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  extending  from  Galle  to  Pottuvil  via
Hambantota.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coast extending from Galle to Pottuvil via Hambantota can be fairly rough
times. Other sea areas around the island will be moderate.
Temporarily strong gusty winds and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
